programme.title: Blackish
programme.desc: Coloured Commentary – Dre wants the family to feel more connected so he encourages “Team Johnson” to embrace what it means to have each other’s backs. But Dre creates trouble for himself when he falls short of Bow’s expectations. Meanwhile, Bow and Dre invoke “Team Johnson” and put the less-than-enthusiastic Zoey and Andre Jr. in charge of babysitting the twins.(n)

programme.title: America’s Got Talent (SS8)
programme.desc: America's Got Talent returns for the eighth series of the search for the hottest variety and novelty acts from across the US. With acts ranging from the weird to the spectacular, the quest is on to find the best talent on offer. NO age limits, NO talent boundaries and NO second chances. Featuring Sharon Osbourne, Howard Stern, Howie Mandel, Nick Cannon.(n)

programme.title: HotFM AM Krew (2015)
programme.desc: A show which gives an insight to how the Hot FM AM KREW handles their show ‘live’ every morning. What you hear on the radio, you’ll be able to watch live on tv! Starring the hottest deejays in Malaysia, Farah Fauzana, AG & Fizie.(n)

programme.title: Step Forward (SS7)
programme.desc: An eye-opening and captivating magazine series. Step Forward rises to the occasion to promote our rich and bountiful land and has become the highest-rated local Chinese Documentary Magazine. Be filled with wonder as we search the length and breadth of the country for more insights on how people use the resources to get food and make a living from it. New discoveries reveal the inner colors of every unique location in Malaysia through the exploration of local activities.(n)

programme.title: Best Of Hokkien Drama
programme.desc: Covering two generations, this drama series revolves around the working-class folks striving for a better future amidst the hustle and bustle of a night market.(n)

programme.title: Where Are We Going Dad (S1)
programme.desc: Where Are We Going, Dad? is a Chinese reality show. The first season features five celebrity fathers and their children as they travel to rural places and perform tasks together. Every week, celebrity dads will accompany their children on a 3-day trip for a village experience. The fathers will single handedly look after their kids and complete missions together with them with unexpected situations, both father and child will have an unforgettable time that they've never experienced before. Featuring: Jimmy Lin, Wang Yuelun, Guo Tao, Zhang Liang, Tian Liang.(n)

programme.title: The Demi-Gods And Semi Devils
programme.desc: The epic drama centers around the Beggar Leader Qiao Feng, the Dali Prince Duan Yu and the Shaolin Monk Xu Zhu. Each of their stories are interweaved throughout the show and finally connect during the climax of the story. Qiao Feng’s story is his quest to find his real identity and the mystery surrounding an event that occured 30 years prior that left him as an orphan. Duan Yu’s story covers his meetings with many of his half sisters that he did not know he had (thanks to his adventurous dad during his young days) and the battle with Duan Yuan Qing as the rightful ruler of Dali. Xu Zhu is a lowly Shaolin Monk who gets caught in the middle of an internal struggle of the Care Free Sect, one of the most powerful and secretative sects around. Their stories take place during the Northern Song Dynasty and across warring kingdoms of Song, Liao, Dali, and Western Xia.(n)

programme.title: Eve’s Diary (2015)
programme.desc: Eve’s Diary were a very significant program for 8TV, and now, she is back! The program is especially dedicated to modern Malaysian Chinese women. It features brand new, fresh and updated categories such as Health, Career, Education, Food, Parenthood, Travel, Relationship and Interests.(n)

programme.title: 8 E-News 2015
programme.desc: 8 E-news brings you the local and international entertainment news, from what’s new and what’s hot.(n)

programme.title: The Dream Makers
programme.desc: Through its set of varying characters, “The Dream Makers” weave a story about the potential consequences of fame and fortune within the entertainment industry. The iron ladies of this story are Wei Yun, a 42-year-old who heads a variety channel, and Kang Li, who is hailed as “Drama Queen” for her theatrical antics. Wei Yun has to deal with a lying lover Zhi Ming while Kang Li has a family that seems to be falling apart. Soon, both women realise that life is more than having successful careers. They discover the true meaning of love found in families and friendships. Meanwhile, young starlings Zhao Fei Er, Fang Tong Lin, Jason Lam and Gao Jian are embroiled in a love rectangle haunted by fame, fortune, hurt and rejection.(n)

programme.title: Best Of Hokkien Drama
programme.desc: The heart of a woman is like the sea. The heart of a woman is like a shroud, wind or cloud. The heart of a woman is ever-changing and the only thing that doesn’t change is their deepest desire to have real love. The largest cosmetic company in Taiwan is Changren Group. Their business relies on earning money from women in the society. However the involvement of women had been the cause for family feuds as well. 30 years ago, the CEO of Changren Group, Chen Hao Wen, on his wedding night caught his wife, Xie Li Ling, and his sister’s husband, Li Ming Long, having an affair. With a sudden burst of rage, he wanted to kill both of them. However, he accidently killed his younger sister, Hao Ping, who came to his husband’s rescue. A red letter day became a day of mourning but the suffering of the Chen family had only begun. 30 years later, the successor of Changren Group, Chen Wei Ming, for the sake of a smooth succession and to avenge his ex-girlfriend, asked Liu Shi Mei to marry him on the basis of a marriage contract. Du Ying Qi, who is deeply in love with Liu Shi Mei, reluctantly agrees to it. The reason is that he wanted to help Liu Shi Mei save her family from harm.(n)

programme.title: Best Of TVB
programme.desc: At court, two of the most famous lawyers in town YU YING-WAI and LEE MING-YEUNG are always carrying out tit-for-tat attacks on each other. YING-WAI eventually turns the tide before he is defeated, however, he almost loses his life in the process, which completely alters his perspective on life. Such change catches a Senior Counsel LO SUM-PO's eye, and he recruits YING-WAI to handle a litigation regarding the will of a late tycoon. MING-YEUNG has to return to his mentor SHUM YIK-WO's law firm because he is now debt-ridden. As soon as he gets there, he starts cooperating with his mentor's daughter SHUM YUET-KAN. For many years, YUET-KAN has been dating SONG KA-YIU, a scion of a wealthy family. KA-YIU, who craves for greatness and success, is a complacent person, making it easy for MING-YEUNG to take advantage of. When the litigation gets underway, the trial judge turns out to be YING-WAI's ex-wife as well as MING-YEUNG's old flame LUK SZE-YING. Once again going head-to-head at court, the two gradually discover there is something else going on in the case. To their surprise, the key man maintains a vital connection with YING-WAI's protégé CHING KA-MING. Thus, a life-or-death turmoil begins in the law firm.(n)

programme.title: Mandarin News 2015
programme.desc: Mandarin News 2015.(n)

programme.title: Legend Of Great Chinese Surgeon - Hua Tuo
programme.desc: During the Three Kingdoms period, never for a moment has the fire of war ceased. Young Hua Tuo lived a free life in his hometown, Bozhou. One day, he performed a miracle and brought the dying Mingxin back to Life. Since then, he was known as the “magic doctor” and was attracted to Mingxin. In the capital, Hua Tuo had a close relationship with Guan Yu, Cao Cao and Wu Side but he also witnessed many dangers of the officialdom and inconstancies of human relationships. The most painful was the fact that, his senior fellow apprentice Wu Side raped Mingxin, the woman he loved. However, he still remained kind and finally successfully developed Mafeisan—the first anesthetic in the world for surgery and managed to restore Mingxin’s eyesight. .(n)

programme.title: Best In The World Yr 4
programme.desc: Adam’s inner child returns as he travels to Hong Kong and explores the magical world of Hong Kong Disneyland! Aside from losing himself on all the thrilling rides, he relishes some of the best meals within the park. After leaving Disneyland reluctantly, he devours a huge plate of Sesame Oil Chicken and Wonton Casserole at a famous Chinese-Muslim restaurant. Since Hong Kong is an international city, he hits up Spice Restaurant for some fusion dishes and ends the day with a breathtaking view of the whole of Hong Kong up on the Victoria Peak and Sky 100 building.(n)

programme.title: Popcorn Hour

programme.title: Cinta Ilmu Akidah & Falsafah 2015
programme.desc: Bersama Ustaz Badlishah membincangkan tentang pengajian akidah dan falsafah serta ideologi yang bercanggah dengan keimanan. .(n)

programme.title: Kuliah Solat Maghrib 2015
programme.desc: Kuliah Solat.(n)

programme.title: Memoir Musafir
programme.desc: Mengisahkan pengalaman serta pengamatan seorang pengembara yg berkunjung ke negara-negara bekas Soviet Union (komunis) yg terdapat di Eropah dan Asia.(n)

programme.title: Berita Alhijrah 2015 (L)
programme.desc: Berita Utama Tv-Alhijrah terbahagi kepada beberapa segmen iaitu Berita Utama Harian, Berita Luar Negara, Laporan Khas, sukan, ramalan cuaca, saham & ekonomi.(n)

programme.title: Khawater Ss 9
programme.desc: Ahmad Asyaqiri sebagai host kepada rancangan yang bertujuan mendidik masyarakat terutamanya golongan remaja dengan persoalan-persoalan khusus dan umum.(n)

programme.title: Isu Akidah Ss 17
programme.desc: Mengupa isu amalan memuja semangat laut telah lama ditinggalkan, Namun kewujudan pesta pantai sekarang dikatakan kesinambungan dari pesta puja laut dahulu.(n)

programme.title: 30 Minit Ustaz Don 2015
programme.desc: Kuliah interaktif yang akan dikendalikan oleh ustaz Don Daniyal. Topik pengisian adalah terdiri dari pembelajaran bacaan Al Quran Al Karim (tajwid dan tadarus) dan bual bicara mengenai evolusi kejadian manusia.(n)

programme.title: Majalah Islam Ss 15
programme.desc: Memaparkan kisah-kisah mengenai masyarakat Muslim, alam persekitaran, lokasi dan isu semasa dari perspektif Islam.(n)

programme.title: Ayat Riwayat Ss 2
programme.desc: Dokumentari yang merangkumi kisah-kisah umat terdahulu yang hidup aman makmur di bawah bimbingan para Rasul dan kisah umat-umat yang telah pupus dan hilang dari pandangan kerana ingkar dan menolak dakwah Rasul.(n)

programme.title: Travelog Haji : Mengubah Sempadan Iman
programme.desc: Menceritakan nama asal Madinah iaitu Yathrib.Kemudian Yathrib ditukar kepada Madinah Al-Munawwarah dan beberapa lagi nama lain bagi Madinah. Juga merakamkan lawatan ke perkuburan Baqi' serta Masjid Quba'.(n)

programme.title: KA
programme.desc: 5 couples. Different walks of life. Different ideologies. Yet with the same purpose - LOVE. In the process of seeking, salvaging and securing their LOVE, we see the 5 couples go through the biggest tests in their lives. Sit back and say a little pray.(n)
